          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion dans un miroir tournant</string>
            <string language="en">Reflection in a rotating mirror</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion in einem drehenden Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão em um espelho girando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione in uno specchio di rotazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση σε έναν περιστρεφόμενο καθρέφτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión en un espejo que rota</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que les rayons reflétés sur un miroir tournant tournent aussi.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that reflected rays of a rotating mirror rotate as well.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">incidence angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß reflektierte Strahlen 
eines drehenden Spiegels sich außerdem drehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os raios refletidos 
de um espelho girando giram também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i raggi riflessi 
di uno specchio di rotazione ruotano pure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι απεικονισμένες 
ακτίνες ενός περιστρεφόμενου καθρέφτη περιστρέφονται επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los rayos 
reflejados de un espejo que rota rotan también.</string>
          </description>
